com.nokia.examples
Interface InfoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
NfcMenuForm
public interface InfoInterface

Callback interface for Nfc Classes to interact with the UI / controller.

Author:
Andreas Jakl

Method Summary

Method Detail

tagError

void tagError(java.lang.String text)
Callback when reading / writing to a text was not successful.

Parameters:
text - Text to show in a message box if desired.

tagSuccess

void tagSuccess(java.lang.String text)
Callback when writing to a tag was successful.

Parameters:
text - Text to show in a message box if desired.

displayAlert

void displayAlert(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  javax.microedition.lcdui.AlertType type)
Utility function to show a Java ME alert, as used for informing the user about events in this demo app.

Parameters:
title - title text to use for the message box.
text - text to show as the main message in the box.
type - one of the available alert types, defining the icon, sound and display length.

logTagInfo

void logTagInfo(java.lang.String text)
Log information about a tag in textual form.

Parameters:
text - Text that contains information about the tag.

tagReady

void tagReady()
Callback when a tag was found. The NFC manager will then establish a new thread and call this method, so that commands can be issued to the tag.
